scheme_name: PMMSY: Construction of New Grow Out Ponds - Haryana
brief_description: The scheme aims to expand fisheries in various urban and semi-urban areas through the construction of new grow-out ponds. Through this scheme, subsidies are provided for the construction of new grow-out ponds to beneficiaries who are engaged in fisheries.
detailed_description: The scheme "Pradhan Mantri Matasya Sampada Yojana: Construction of New Grow out Ponds" by the Ministry Of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying, Government of India, aims to expand fisheries in various urban and semi-urban areas through the construction of new grow-out ponds. Through this scheme, subsidies are provided for the construction of new grow-out ponds to beneficiaries who are engaged in fisheries.
benefits: The scheme provides financial assistance for the Construction of the New Grow-out Ponds. The project cost is ₹7,00,000/- per Hectare. The subsidy will be limited to 40% of the project cost for beneficiaries falling under the General Category. The subsidy will be limited to 60% of the project cost for beneficiaries who are Scheduled Caste (SC) or Women.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must have a Parivar Pehchan Patra (PPP). The construction of new grow-out ponds subsidy will be provided by the State Government for the expansion of fisheries in various urban/semi-urban areas only under the construction of new grow-out ponds under the Pradhan Mantri Matasya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) scheme. Central financial assistance for the construction of new grow-out ponds will be provided only for the ponds prepared for fisheries. The applicant should have own land with clear title or having land on a long-term registered lease, not less than a minimum of 7 years.

documents_required: Agreement Deed between Beneficiary and Fisheries Department. Date of Birth Certificate (Voting Card/ Birth Certificate/ Aadhar Card/ Matriculation Certificate). Caste Certificate (from first-class Magistrate, Tehsildar). Training Certificate of Beneficiary. Land Record from Tehsil (Own Land-Jamabandi, Nakal Akshizra Farad) or Registered Lease Deed of Minimum 7 Years. Bills/Receipts/Vouchers. Photographs of Ponds/Nurseries/Aerators, etc. with Beneficiary. Details of Bank Account and PAN Card. Detailed Project Report (DPR)/Self-Contained Proposal (SCP) as per PMMSY guidelines.
